message_to_vitalik:
BUILD ORDER:
1. Create soleinvictvs-web/about.html from scratch.
2. Head: @font-face comment (path: assets/fonts/), Google Fonts 4-family, C-006 tokens, reset.
3. Body: data-page='about'. Add operator swap HTML comment block at top of body.
4. Nav: shared canonical (position:fixed).
5. Page hero: 'PHILOSOPHY' eyebrow, 'THE UNCONQUERED LIFE' h1, gold rule, sub.
6. Three Pillars section: 3-col grid, expanded content for Philosophy, Discipline, Community. Write the body text — 4 sentences per pillar minimum. Direct, philosophical, brand voice.
7. Four Virtues section: 2×2 grid on var(--surface) background. Sapientia, Iustitia, Fortitudo, Temperantia. Each card: Latin name (--font-display), English name, definition, 2-sentence body, Stoic quote with attribution.
8. Founder section: circular avatar (sun_transparent.png), 'THE FOUNDER' placeholder name, 'FOUNDER · SOLEINVICTVS' title, gold rule, three bio paragraphs. Write the bio — it must be publishable today.
9. Newsletter section: copy exact markup and handleSignup() from index.html.
10. Footer: shared canonical.
11. JS: scroll reveal + handleSignup.

WATCH OUT FOR:
- Placeholder bio paragraphs must read like real founder content. Re-read the brand_reference.md before writing.
- Founder avatar: ../brand_assets/sun_transparent.png — note the ../ because about.html lives in soleinvictvs-web/, same as virtue-audit.html.
- Four Virtues section has background: var(--surface) — slightly lighter than the page bg. Ensure the card background uses var(--bg) to create the contrast layer.
- Page title in <title> tag: 'Philosophy — SOLEINVICTVS' (not 'About').

DO NOT:
- Use real founder information — placeholder only.
- Create any linked article pages.

DONE WHEN:
- All five sections render cleanly.
- 'Philosophy' nav link is gold on this page.
- Founder avatar shows circular sun placeholder.
- Bio paragraphs read in brand voice.
- Mobile stacks pillars and virtues to 1 column.
- Newsletter submits and shows 'Enlisted ✦'.
